paragraphs: A partnership between Wood Elf, High Elf, and the Khajiit is preposterous. Can you not see? Queen Ayrenn will take and take, like a well-coifed hoarvor suckling at a heart-wound. The High Elves would like nothing more than to have us under their rule. We're less than cousins, less than Elves, to them.

It's time for the Bosmer to hunt again. We'll take Valenwood back. For our people, for Hircine. And we'll have Hircine's blessing as we do it.
—Calahawn
